title: White Icons/widgets leave mark on screen
content:
I have 2 Widgets for e-mails, the camera icon and the Google Assistant Bar, always in the same place at the home screen.
The common thing is that the background of those elements is white.
When I load an app that has a white back ground, use the camera with light colors scene, or just see at something light on the screen, I would see the shape of the widgets and the icons.
It´s difficult to show without looking at the phone, but I tried to take a picture of it and attached it here, although it´s way more noticeable looking at it directly.


I´ve attached another picture to "show" where to look:



Would this enter under a warranty issue?

Thanks,
